levels.levelDescription: Welcome to the Eclipsed Grove, where the unsettling whispers of the ethereal shadows meld with the twisted, dark-grass beneath your feet. A serene facade hides the treacherous waters that lie in wait to test your resolve.

Traverse the icy expanse of the Frostfire Ridge, where the glittering snowflakes mask the looming perils of the abyss below. Each step is a dance with fate as you navigate the frostbitten terrain, the air tinged with an aura of ominous tranquility.

Descend into the unhallowed depths of the Shadowsoul Catacombs, where the rusty-chain-platforms creak under the weight of forgotten souls. Rivers of molten lava flow ominously below, mirroring the fiery malevolence of the legendary Duskmourne Shadowreaper that awaits at the heart of this dread-filled labyrinth.
